The surge of information was startling. He had no defense against it and i=
t happened very quickly. After it ended he tried to order it, throw out wha=
t he already knew and fit all the pieces in order. Yes, Maxima, a superb wa=
rrior under the original Megatron's command. While his motives had changed =
conciderably, the personality and methods were largely unchanged. 
=A0
Outs=
ide his own head he heard the unique spark manage to speak. Yes, that was c=
ertainly her voice. Now she needed a form to inhabit, one fitting a warrior=
 of her calibur. The alcove came to life once more, bright light shining up=
on the white and black body. First his blood red optics came to life, and t=
he frame work of the restraints began to retract. The sheets of ice that ha=
d formed over him shattered and fell away. His head wrenched it's way free =
first, then left shoulder and right.
=A0
As his arms were freed his rifle a=
nd fusion cannon were connected to his arms in standby position. Soon his e=
ntire body was free of ice and took a step forward finally, a fog coming fr=
om his still cold form. His gaze settled on the spark before him, reguardin=
g it.
=A0
"I am not the orginal Megatron, but I reason just as good. First =
you must have a proper body, and I shall craft and form it myself. COme, it=
 will not do for you to remain so unguarded such as you are," the Deceptico=
n stated, raising his arm to guide the spark back to the medical bay. At th=
is stage he could easily modify the intermediate body already under constru=
ction to something she would like.
=A0
"It has been a long time since I had=
 someone near I could trust," he stated, accessing the console and began ac=
tively changing the sparkless body to what would be the physical manifestat=
ion of the spark.

--- On Wed, 9/9/09, forevermegatron <MaximaSR74@...>=
 wrote:


From: forevermegatron <MaximaSR74@...>
Subject: Re: Returning=
 Home
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: Wednesday, September 9, 2009, 7:13 P=
M


=A0 



> =A0
> "I am Megatron, where and who are you? Why does a voice=
 disturb me in my own fortress?" he demanded, his recharge bay springing to=
 life. It had prepared to disengage, several mechanisms primed to fire and =
literally eject him from the bay. A security shutter that blocked the view =
from the alcove to the medical bay retracted, allowing him to loock crosswi=
se into the bay and see the console monitoring his guest spark.
> 
> 

An e=
erie silence that hung about the vicinity; absolute stillness. No sound for=
 a moment. But soon that silence was broken by a ghostly, barely audible ch=
ildlike giggle followed by silence once more. 

After a minute, the silence=
 was broken by barely audible multiple whispers. 

"Help me?" a femme's voi=
ce was heard in the eerie silence.
The fiery spark pulsed as it rose up jus=
t slightly before it floated out of it's containment, passing through anyth=
ing like a ghost, as it floated towards Megatron X. 

Rising vertically jus=
t mere inches from around his feet... his legs... torso... til finally the =
spark was optic level as it hovered there, slightly pulsing. As though stud=
ying Megatron X's faceplate; hard to tell if the faceplate was familiar, if=
 it was reading his meta-processor or observing for some other reason. One =
may never know. 

Until the spark shot towards Megatron X, the spark disapp=
eared into his cranuim. Within moments, the unknown fiery spark merged with=
 the spark of Megatron X.. downloading or uploading or 'giving' Megatron X =
memories, emotions, secrets, anything that most would not know unless seen =
from the point of view of another. That other was the femme known as Maxima=
. Flashes of memories going back from last she was functional as a Beast Ma=
chine, meeting and falling for Hydra whom she believed was Megatron in some=
 future form... all the way back to when she was a Military Aide to Gamma Q=
uadran, back when she first met the real Megatron following a gladiator eve=
nt.
Emotions, fears, courage, triumphs, battles, all those she knew, and mo=
re all left within Megatron X's spark. 

As soon as it happened, within sec=
onds - though it seemed to have lasted several minutes - the unknown fiery =
spark emerged swiftly from the chestplate of Megatron X... and just hovered=
 there before him. 
Whispers once more, ghostly in a reverse echo, a femme'=
s voice, deep, soft yet with sultry malice, "Iam-I am-Max-I-Ma- " words ove=
rlapping as though barely understoon. "I am Maxima" finally was pronounced =
over and over as the words overlapped one another.
